channel.title: Adding models to 602 client
channel.description:
I am using a 602 pi client and there is no raw file to put my deathcape model in there? can someone help me please? where to i place the models?
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oZJ9tSA.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/c6RGpRX.jpg[/img]

item.title: Adding models to 602 client
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[quote=“scar3d, post:1, topic:537564”]I am using a 602 pi client and there is no raw file to put my deathcape model in there? can someone help me please? where to i place the models?

[/quote]

The method which loads the sprites is commonly running in the client class, search for it and post it here, i think we both can easily fix this.

Read full topic
